subject: Something broke?
description_text:
Hi Simsonn. 

I recently got my Simsonn Plus X Sim Racing Pedals. 
After a day and a half of use, I wanted to shorten my accelerators travel length a bit. After doing so, I gently pushed it down with my hand to see and feel how long the travel was after the adjustment. 

When I hit the blue part(the stop) I heard a noise of something breaking and let go instantly. I then found this part(picture included) lying on the floor closer to my seat. 

I can’t seem to locate where it normally sits and broke from?


I hope you can help and clear my confusion a bit. 

Thanks in advance.
 
- Oliver
Sendt fra min iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Oliver Skytte,    We regret to inform you that a batch of goods was assembled by temporary staff, resulting in structural deficiencies. Consequently, adjusting the throttle travel may cause this spacer to contact the blue limit switch and fracture. We apologise for the inconvenience caused and will dispatch a replacement throttle pedal to you as soon as possible. Please provide your order number.

I see.

Unfortunately I ordered my set from AliExpress, since that made the most
sense for my location at that time.
However if you need that order number for anything, here it is:
3060474082519172

Thanks, hope to hear back from you again soon.

- Oliver
